content.triptychDescription: Premier Foods expanding into new categories while their core brands underperform. Classic symptom of misalignment nobody can name. Strategic Triptych Assessment: we examine how you market, compete, and execute simultaneously. Problems hide where these lenses don't align. Like when marketing promises what product can't deliver while strategy assumes capabilities that don't exist. See all three, or see nothing.
